snippet: United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on Tuesday condemned the expulsion of the top U.N. human rights official in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and called on the U.N. Security Council to consider possible action....

headline.print_headline: U.N. Condemns Top Human Rights Official's Expulsion From Congo
headline.main: U.N. Condemns Top Human Rights Official's Expulsion From Congo

lead_paragraph: United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on Tuesday condemned the expulsion of the top U.N. human rights official in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and called on the U.N. Security Council to consider possible action.
